segment.source: Understand the AppLocker policy deployment process (Windows 10)
segment.target: Understand the AppLocker policy deployment process (Windows 10)

segment.source: This planning and deployment topic for the IT professional describes the process for using AppLocker when deploying application control policies.
segment.target: This planning and deployment topic for the IT professional describes the process for using AppLocker when deploying application control policies.

segment.source: Understand the AppLocker policy deployment process
segment.target: Understand the AppLocker policy deployment process

segment.source: This planning and deployment topic for the IT professional describes the process for using AppLocker when deploying application control policies.
segment.target: This planning and deployment topic for the IT professional describes the process for using AppLocker when deploying application control policies.

segment.source: To successfully deploy AppLocker policies, you need to identify your application control objectives and construct the policies for those objectives.
segment.target: To successfully deploy AppLocker policies, you need to identify your application control objectives and construct the policies for those objectives.

segment.source: The key to the process is taking an accurate inventory of your organization's applications, which requires investigation of all the targeted business groups.
segment.target: The key to the process is taking an accurate inventory of your organization's applications, which requires investigation of all the targeted business groups.

segment.source: With an accurate inventory, you can create rules and set enforcement criteria that will allow the organization to use the required applications and allow the IT department to manage a controlled set of applications.
segment.target: With an accurate inventory, you can create rules and set enforcement criteria that will allow the organization to use the required applications and allow the IT department to manage a controlled set of applications.

segment.source: The following diagram shows the main points in the design, planning, and deployment process for AppLocker.
segment.target: The following diagram shows the main points in the design, planning, and deployment process for AppLocker.

segment.source: Resources to support the deployment process
segment.target: Resources to support the deployment process

segment.source: The following topics contain information about designing, planning, deploying, and maintaining AppLocker policies:
segment.target: The following topics contain information about designing, planning, deploying, and maintaining AppLocker policies:

segment.source: For info about the AppLocker policy design and planning requirements and process, see AppLocker Design Guide.
segment.target: For info about the AppLocker policy design and planning requirements and process, see AppLocker Design Guide.

segment.source: For info about the AppLocker policy deployment requirements and process, see AppLocker deployment guide.
segment.target: For info about the AppLocker policy deployment requirements and process, see AppLocker deployment guide.

segment.source: For info about AppLocker policy maintenance and monitoring, see Administer AppLocker.
segment.target: For info about AppLocker policy maintenance and monitoring, see Administer AppLocker.

segment.source: For info about AppLocker policy architecture, components, and processing, see AppLocker technical reference.
segment.target: For info about AppLocker policy architecture, components, and processing, see AppLocker technical reference.
